long_description: It doesn't get much fluffier than this. The Patagonia Pelage jacket wraps you in a unique, fun fleece that's sure to please. Curly, deep-pile polyester fleece fabric is warm, comfortable and quick drying. Plain-weave polyester lining easily slides over base layers. Asymmetric button closure. Handwarmer pockets.
short_description: It doesn't get much fluffier than this. The Patagonia Pelage jacket wraps you in a unique, fun fleece that's sure to please.
